gobblin.metrics.reporter

Class ContextAwareScheduledReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codahale.metrics.ScheduledReporter
      • gobblin.metrics.reporter.ContextAwareScheduledReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reporter, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractHadoopCounterReporter

    public abstract class ContextAwareScheduledReporter
extends ScheduledReporter
    A custom ScheduledReporter that is aware of the MetricContext it is associated to.

      • reportInContext

        protected abstract void reportInContext(MetricContext context,
                                        SortedMap<String,Gauge> gauges,
                                        SortedMap<String,Counter> counters,
                                        SortedMap<String,Histogram> histograms,
                                        SortedMap<String,Meter> meters,
                                        SortedMap<String,Timer> timers)
        Report all the given metrics in the MetricContext.

        Called periodically by the polling thread. Subclasses should report all the given metrics.

        The metric names (the keys in the given SortedMaps) may or may not include the Tags of the MetricContext depending on if the MetricContext is configured to report fully-qualified metric names or not using the method MetricContext.Builder#reportFullyQualifiedNames(boolean). It is up to the implementation of this method to decide on whether to include the name of the MetricContext (given by MetricContext.getName()) and the Tags of individual ContextAwareMetrics when reporting them.

        Parameters:
        gauges - all of the gauges in the MetricContext
        counters - all of the counters in the MetricContext
        histograms - all of the histograms in the MetricContext
        meters - all of the meters in the MetricContext
        timers - all of the timers in the MetricContext
